modal.title: Certified Pre-Owned Equipment Meets the Following Specifications:

items.text: Minor scratches and small dents are allowed
Severely dented panels or covers are replaced
Products are cleaned and dust free
A “Used Product” sticker is adhered to the top part of the machine where it is clearly visible
Products are re-boxed or re-crated with the proper “U” tags and “Used Product” stickers attached to the carton or crate
Appropriate serial number label and product labels are applied
Products are sold at the original factory warranty term
Tested in our factory using the same testing procedures as new equipment
